quiz.instructions: This quiz contains 20 multiple-choice questions covering various topics related to Google Cloud Platform's Data Engineer certification. Answer all questions to get your final score.

questions.questionText: What is the primary goal of the Professional Data Engineer certification on Google Cloud Platform?
options: A. To certify expertise in building and operationalizing data processing systems.
B. To assess knowledge in cloud infrastructure management.
C. To evaluate proficiency in basic programming languages.
D. To measure skills in web development.

questions.questionText: Which GCP service is best suited for building data lakes?
In the context of New York Taxi Trips data, what would be an appropriate use case for BigQuery?
options: A. Storing and querying trip records for analytical purposes.
D. Running machine learning models directly.

questions.questionText: Which command is used to create a Dataflow job from a template?
What is the purpose of clustering in BigQuery tables?
options: B. To organize data for optimized query performance.
C. To ensure high availability of data.
D. To enforce data integrity constraints.

questions.questionText: Which BigQuery SQL feature can be used to improve query performance by limiting data scanned?
What is the role of Cloud Dataflow in building batch data pipelines?
options: B. Developing and executing data processing pipelines

questions.questionText: Which command is used to deploy a Dataproc cluster?
What is the main advantage of using BigQuery ML for machine learning?
options: A. No need for data preprocessing
B. Ability to run machine learning models directly within BigQuery

questions.questionText: Which GCP service is used for real-time messaging in streaming analytics?
In the context of Cymbal Retails, what GCP service would you use for scalable and fault-tolerant data warehousing?
How do you ensure data security and compliance in GCP?
options: A. Using Cloud IAM for access management
B. Storing data in regional storage
C. Encrypting all data in transit
D. Setting up firewalls for virtual machines

questions.questionText: Which of the following is a serverless data processing service on GCP?
What is the first step in the BigQuery ML workflow?
Which SQL statement in BigQuery would you use to create a new table from an existing one?
How would you use Python and Apache Beam to read from a text file in a Dataflow pipeline?
Which GCP service can be used for cataloging and discovering data?
Which command is used to submit a Spark job to a Dataproc cluster?
options: A. gcloud dataproc jobs submit spark

questions.questionText: What is the purpose of Vertex AI in Google Cloud?
options: A. To manage machine learning models and workflows
C. To provide data visualization tools
D. To run SQL queries on data

questions.questionText: Which SQL clause is used in BigQuery to partition tables by date?
Write a BigQuery SQL query to create a logistic regression model to predict whether a taxi trip in New York will have a tip greater than $5 based on features like trip distance and fare amount.
options: A. CREATE OR REPLACE MODEL mydataset.taxi_tip_model OPTIONS (model_type='logistic_reg') AS SELECT tip > 5 AS label, trip_distance, fare_amount FROM mydataset.taxi_trips;
B. CREATE OR REPLACE MODEL mydataset.taxi_tip_model OPTIONS (model_type='linear_reg') AS SELECT tip > 5 AS label, trip_distance, fare_amount FROM mydataset.taxi_trips;
C. CREATE OR REPLACE MODEL mydataset.taxi_tip_model OPTIONS (model_type='kmeans') AS SELECT tip > 5 AS label, trip_distance, fare_amount FROM mydataset.taxi_trips;
D. CREATE OR REPLACE MODEL mydataset.taxi_tip_model OPTIONS (model_type='boosted_tree_classifier') AS SELECT tip > 5 AS label, trip_distance, fare_amount FROM mydataset.taxi_trips;
